name: outloud.ai
headline: Building Gong.io for offline retail.
description: We record conversations that customers have when they are placing orders in drive-thru restaurants, automatically analyze them, and help operators to upsell better or alert them when they are out of stock.

# Outloud.ai: New AI standard for drive-thrus
We have handled 40 million orders in hundreds of restaurants.
[Get Started ](https://www.outloud.ai/</demo>)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg height='483' width='350' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![](https://www.outloud.ai/)![Customer satisfaction](https://www.outloud.ai/static/d361f6ed4d1d5a2eca39b6a0a69c03ef/9541f/feature-llm.png)
### Custom LLMs for operations
## Get notified in real-time about ops issues
We've fine-tuned the latest Large Language Models to detect every significant operational issue such as stores not taking orders, equipment malfunction, product shortages, etc.
![](https://www.outloud.ai/)![Suggestive upsell](https://www.outloud.ai/static/7c217faeb124495adf0c484cc2bba1c1/f0175/feature-upsell.png)
### Next-gen revenue intelligence
## Increase your check by 15% with upsell
We use advanced AI pipeline to understand when, what, and how your employees upsell.
![](https://www.outloud.ai/)![Ops](https://www.outloud.ai/static/1da24d98cd8800207a32d9028f9d6f70/ad7d4/feature-ops.png)
### Voice AI for smart order processing
## Reduce your total SoS to less than 3 minutes
Our models are trained on thousands hours of data to help your team boost crucial metrics like speed of service.
## How it works
### Record
Employee/guest order-taking
### Analyze
Each order in real-time
### Alert
When restaurants have ops issues
100,000Orders processed daily
$75,000Increase in gross profit per store
20+States in our operation network
Why us?
## Helping our clients succeed
Our users love Outloud. Here's what they are saying
With Outloud, front-line teams are able to provide much better service to guests given the Outloud tech creates clear incentives to do so. Guests are happy, restaurants get higher revenue, and employees are directly rewarded as a result of their hard work.
Tanvir, VP of tech
400+ stores
You can't manage what you can't measure. Outloud quantifies every single interaction between customers and restaurant teams to help run better ops.
Daniel, CFO
3,000+ stores
## Get started with Outloud
Get full transparency on what is happening on the front lines of your business in real-time
[Request a Demo](https://www.outloud.ai/</demo>)

generated_description:
**Outloud.ai: Revolutionizing Drive-Thru Efficiency with AI**

Welcome to Outloud.ai, where we‚Äôre on a mission to build the Gong.io for offline retail, specifically targeting drive-thru restaurants. Launched in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's S21 batch, we‚Äôve set up our base in sunny Miami, FL, with an ambitious team of five. 

**What We Do**
Outloud.ai started by recording and analyzing customer conversations during drive-thru orders. This isn't just eavesdropping‚Äîwe provide actionable insights that help restaurant operators upsell more effectively and get real-time alerts for stock shortages. In our quest for operational excellence, we‚Äôve managed to process over 40 million orders across hundreds of restaurants.

**Key Features**
- **Custom Large Language Models (LLMs)**: We‚Äôve fine-tuned AI models to pick up on crucial operational issues‚Äîlike stores struggling to take orders or running low on products.
- **Upselling Intelligence**: Our technology identifies the right moments for upselling, helping to boost revenue by as much as 15%.
- **Voice AI for Speed**: We‚Äôve trained our models on hundreds of thousands of hours of data, enabling restaurants to reduce their service time to under three minutes.
  
**The Impact**
On a daily basis, we process around 100,000 orders. Our clients report a staggering increase of $75,000 in gross profits per store. We currently operate in over 20 states, enabling transparency across the front lines of their businesses.

Our users can't stop raving about how Outloud.ai has transformed their operations. As Tanvir, a VP of Tech at a 400+ store chain says, "With Outloud, front-line teams are able to provide much better service," creating a win-win for everyone involved.

**Get Involved**
Curious about how we can help your business? Request a demo on our website [Outloud.ai](https://www.outloud.ai/), and join the movement toward smarter, data-driven drive-thrus. 

In a nutshell, Outloud.ai is about harnessing the power of machine learning to not just keep up with the fast pace of the food service industry but to stay ahead. Let‚Äôs make fast food faster and more profitable together. 

*Tags: Machine Learning, SaaS, B2B*
